items.text: short outside off, stabbed to backward point with an open face
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fails to capitalise on width as he drives straight to cover
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: hurried into a pull and skews it off the bottom of the bat behind square
items.shortText: Russell to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: finally finds the gap as he leans into a drive. Not middled too well but past the left of the fielder
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.preText: Sadman Hasan: "The run scoring rate seems pretty slow. Is the run check due to some good-looking or the pitch playing a little too slow for the batsmen to open up?" The moisture has made it slow and heavy. And good, tight bowling as well.
items.text: Tamim switches gears.. two in two as he shuffles across and heaves off the hips through backward square leg
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: slower short ball outside off, goes through early with a pull and gets beaten
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: this is a poor over from Russell. This one's sprayed on the pads, and Tamim flicks off it through fine leg
items.shortText: Russell to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: short of a length on the stumps, tries to block and nearly chops on
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: shortish, angled across, jumps and blocks
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: back of a length, shuffles across and whips to midwicket
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: length on middle, nudged to midwicket
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: short, angled across, knocked to backward point
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, blocked down the pitch
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: full on the stumps, flicked to midwicket
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, angled across and drifts further as he lets it go
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: is that a drop Difficult one for the cover fielder as he gets down to his right but lets it spill out after Tamim flays this cut to a short ball
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: loosely chases a shortish one and inside edges, just about misses the stumps
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, pulled through square leg
items.shortText: Joseph to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face to backward point
items.shortText: Joseph to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: back of a length, clips the pad as he tries to nudge it and it skips away fine
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 4 leg byes

items.text: short of a length, angled across, tapped to point
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on off, works it through square leg
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: opens the face late and guides it behind point
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: slower full ball, pushed through cover-point
items.shortText: Holder to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: gets on top of a short one and flays it to third man
items.shortText: Holder to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run
